pages.text: $(li)The Honeycomb is a item that can be obtained right clicking a Bee Nest or Beehive while you are holding a pair of Shears on your hand.$(br)$(li)This item can be used to craft multiple items in a Crafting Table.

pages.title: Crafts
pages.text: $(li)Beehives$(li)Waxed Corundums$(li)Candles$(li)Honeycomb Door$(li)Honeycomb Trapdoor$(li)Bee Lanterns$(li)Banner Pattern Honeycomb$(li)Honey Pot$(li)Honeycomb Armor
